entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 24. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
